name: AFA-Atlantic Flight Academy
baseAirport: Atlantik Flight Academy (AFA); was established in 2011 to provide professional pilot training in accordance with SHT-FCL and EASA Part-FCL (Flight Crew Licensing), national- international civil aviation rules and regulations, in order to meet the increasing need for qualified pilots in the fast-growing aviation industry.
about: AFA-Atlantic Flight Academy, located in Florya, Istanbul, is a premier aviation training institution founded by Atlasjet Airlines. Dedicated to meeting the global demand for pilots, AFA provides comprehensive training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and type ratings for aircraft such as the A320. With a strong commitment to safety and excellence, AFA equips aspiring aviators with advanced theoretical knowledge and sufficient flying experience, preparing them for successful careers in the aviation sector. AFA's high-quality training and young aircraft fleet ensure that students receive the best possible education to navigate the skies with confidence.
